block.p: Claudia Anne Mesrop, a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Alden Mesrop of Pelham, N.Y., was married yesterday to Eric William Zeller, a son of Ann Mooney of Cleveland Heights, Ohio, and Stephen Zeller of New Rochelle, N.Y. Justice Elaine Jackson Stack of the State Supreme Court in Mineola, N.Y., performed the ceremony at a private home in Quogue, N.Y.
Mrs. Zeller, 36, is the director of advertising for print and broadcast media at Bloomingdale's in New York. She graduated from William Smith College.

Claudia Anne Mesrop, a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Alden Mesrop of Pelham, N.Y., was married yesterday to Eric William Zeller, a son of Ann Mooney of Cleveland Heights, Ohio, and Stephen Zeller of New Rochelle, N.Y. Justice Elaine Jackson Stack of the State Supreme Court in Mineola, N.Y., performed the ceremony at a private home in Quogue, N.Y.
Mrs. Zeller, 36, is the director of advertising for print and broadcast media at Bloomingdale's in New York. She graduated from William Smith College.

Mr. Zeller, 31, is an owner of Orbit Digital, a company in New York that builds and installs film and television editing stations. He graduated from the State University College at Plattsburgh, N.Y. The bridegroom is a stepson of the late Robert Mooney.
